description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
a pair of identical containers either clear or opaque filled with either same or different amount of juice - no_testing_trial / clear-same / opaque-same / clear-different / opaque-different
lc_trial =  the larger quantity was transferred into the cup while the smaller was poured into the tube / lt_trial = the combination of the quantities and the shapes of the containers was reversed.
amount of juice chosen in the 1st choice which was to confirm that the apes were motivated to select the larger quantity  - larger_quantity
amount of juice chosen in the 2nd choice – no_testing_tria (no values)l / larger_quantity (50ml) / smaller_quantity (20ml)
type of container chosen in the 2nd choice – no_testing_trial (no values)  / cup/ tube/
side chose in the 2nd choice - left / right
whether the participant hesitated or not in the 2nd choice - no_hesitation_or_no_testing_trial / hesitation
